# AccessibilityAttachmentModifier

**Structure**

A view modifier that adds accessibility properties to the view

## Declaration

```swift
struct AccessibilityAttachmentModifier
```

## Supporting types

- **AccessibilityTechnologies**: Accessibility technologies available to the system.

## Conforms To

- ViewModifier
